Class ClientPNCounterProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.client.spi.ClientProxy
      • com.hazelcast.client.proxy.ClientPNCounterProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributedObject, PNCounter

    public class ClientPNCounterProxy
extends ClientProxy
implements PNCounter
    Client proxy implementation for a PNCounter.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Description copied from interface: PNCounter
        Resets the observed state by this PN counter. This method may be used after a method invocation has thrown a ConsistencyLostException to reset the proxy and to be able to start a new session.
        Specified by:
        reset in interface PNCounter

      • getCurrentTargetReplicaAddress

        public Address getCurrentTargetReplicaAddress()
        Returns the current target replica address to which this proxy is sending invocations.
